A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
So disappointed after watching this at home last night.  Apart from the plot holes\, bad space physics and indifferent writing and character use this was just a rehash of Empire Strkes Back in reverse.  Even down to an underwater Xwing. Watch it again and tell me it wasn't.  Spectre pulled off a fair better homage than this

And when is Yoda going to go 'Wacca Wacca'?
Did anyone ask where Tinky Winky was now we have Poe?
GOLD stormtroopers?  Too much watching darleks perhaps?
Why were Chewy\, R2 and C3P0 even in the film?

So interesting I played Candy Crush while watching?
